ygData.subject: Re: Weird question
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh.. no... my friend wasn t trying to dupe me. No one tries to take a practical joke out to a 45 min plus argument where I was telling him... look, I don t
ygData.messageBody:
Oh.. no... my friend wasn't trying to dupe me. No
one tries to take a practical joke out to a 45 min
plus argument where I was telling him... look, "I
don't care about the other stuff you're saying-- but
there's no level 65".<br><br>I found myself for 45 mins
going... "No... I don't just think that I'm always right.
No... I'm not saying no on the level 65 b/c I refuse to
admit there might be a way to advance like that/crack
in my 'precious Everquest'. Are you sure it was
Everquest? No don't kill me for asking!" etc etc
etc.<br><br>Needless to say... it was a long long drive to take the
guy 1hr 1/2 out of my way to take him
home.<br><br>shooman out
